hook.text: You can't pour knowledge into someone's head. They have to build it themselves.

buildup.text: Constructivism says learners actively construct understanding by connecting new info to what they know.

punchline.text: You can't give someone understanding. You can only help them build it.

quiz.question: What is the teacher's role in constructivist education?
options: A facilitator who creates conditions for students to build their own understanding
A transmitter who delivers information directly into students' minds
An observer who provides no guidance at all
